classitems.description: Method or generating a unique string to use for binding aria-controls attributes. Returns a prefix with elementID.
classitems.name: controls

return.description: Unique string for use with binding `aria-controls`

classitems.description: Method for generating a unique string to use for binding aria-describedby attributes. Returns a prefix with elementID
classitems.name: describedby

return.description: Unique string for use with binding `aria-describedby`

classitems.description: Method for use with binding aria-expanded. Returns string of negated boolean for hidden.
classitems.name: expanded

return.description: String of negated boolean hidden for expanded

classitems.description: Method for use with directly binding aria-hidden to a component which requires a string boolean b/c Ember will remove the attribute if it is boolean false.
classitems.name: hiddenForArias

classitems.description: Method for generating a unique string to use for binding aria-labelledby attributes. Returns prefix with elementID
classitems.name: labelledby

return.description: Unique string for use with binding `aria-labelledby`

method.description: Method or generating a unique string to use for binding aria-controls attributes. Returns a prefix with elementID.
method.name: controls

return.description: Unique string for use with binding `aria-controls`

method.description: Method for generating a unique string to use for binding aria-describedby attributes. Returns a prefix with elementID
method.name: describedby

return.description: Unique string for use with binding `aria-describedby`

method.description: Method for use with binding aria-expanded. Returns string of negated boolean for hidden.
method.name: expanded

return.description: String of negated boolean hidden for expanded

method.description: Method for use with directly binding aria-hidden to a component which requires a string boolean b/c Ember will remove the attribute if it is boolean false.
method.name: hiddenForArias

method.description: Method for generating a unique string to use for binding aria-labelledby attributes. Returns prefix with elementID
method.name: labelledby

return.description: Unique string for use with binding `aria-labelledby`
